criteria: Ensure that the agent has searched for information about the incident in Notion pages
Ensure that the agent has looked at the marketing-ops channel in Slack, including the relevant threads
Ensure that the agent has captured relevant information from Monday.com
Ensure that the agent has used information from each of Notion, Slack, and Monday.com in the final post mortem report
Ensure that the agent has infered some relevant insight or analysis based on multiple-sources
